trans-unit.id: Automatically configure mirroring to show the virtual screen's content on the associated display.
trans-unit.source: Automatically configure mirroring to show the virtual screen's content on the associated display.

trans-unit.id: Automatically configure mirroring to show the virtual screen's content on the associated display. If multiple associated displays are connected, only one will be mirror target.
trans-unit.source: Automatically configure mirroring to show the virtual screen's content on the associated display. If multiple associated displays are connected, only one will be mirror target.
trans-unit.target: Автоматическая настройка зеркалирования для отображения содержимого виртуального экрана на связанном дисплее. Если подключено несколько связанных дисплеев, только один из них будет зеркальным.

trans-unit.id: Automatically connect the virtual screen when the associated display is online and disconnect when it is not.
trans-unit.source: Automatically connect the virtual screen when the associated display is online and disconnect when it is not.
trans-unit.target: Автоматическое подключение виртуального экрана, когда соответствующий дисплей находится в сети, и отключение, когда его нет.

trans-unit.id: Automatically disable off both Night Shift and True Tone when an external third party display is set to HDR mode and enable them when switching back to SDR mode. Useful for more accurate colors when watching HDR content.
trans-unit.source: Automatically disable off both Night Shift and True Tone when an external third party display is set to HDR mode and enable them when switching back to SDR mode. Useful for more accurate colors when watching HDR content.
trans-unit.target: Автоматическое отключение Night Shift и True Tone при установке внешнего дисплея стороннего производителя в режим HDR и их включение при переключении обратно в режим SDR. Полезно для получения более точных цветов при просмотре HDR-контента.
Автоматически запускать при входе в систему

trans-unit.id: Automatically remove stored configuration details for displays that have not been connected for a while.
trans-unit.source: Automatically remove stored configuration details for displays that have not been connected for a while.
trans-unit.target: Автоматическое удаление сохраненных данных конфигурации для дисплеев, которые не подключались в течение некоторого времени.

trans-unit.id: Automatically stream the virtual screen's content to the associated display. If multiple associated displays are connected, only one will be stream target.
trans-unit.source: Automatically stream the virtual screen's content to the associated display. If multiple associated displays are connected, only one will be stream target.
trans-unit.target: Автоматическая потоковая передача содержимого виртуального экрана на связанный дисплей. Если подключено несколько связанных дисплеев, только один из них будет целевым для потока.
Автоматическое приведение в порядок меню приложений

trans-unit.id: Both turned off by HDR toggle

trans-unit.source: Broadcast OSD notifications to third party apps (see [documentation](https://betterdisplay.pro/integration)).

trans-unit.source: By default the app orders displays alphabetically in the app menu by their (displayed) name. By providing an ordering string, you can redefine the data which serves as the basis of the ordering.

trans-unit.id: Click icon to open/close app menu!
trans-unit.source: Click icon to open/close app menu!
trans-unit.target: Нажмите на иконку, чтобы открыть/закрыть меню приложения!

trans-unit.id: Close the expanded menu item when the app menu is closed. Disabling this preserves the menu layout for the next time the app menu is opened.
trans-unit.source: Close the expanded menu item when the app menu is closed. Disabling this preserves the menu layout for the next time the app menu is opened.

trans-unit.id: Color changes, upscaling and dimming via color table adjustments clip HDR content. With this enabled, the app resets the color table when no adjustments are needed. This might be distracting or cause a black screen on some configurations.
trans-unit.source: Color changes, upscaling and dimming via color table adjustments clip HDR content. With this enabled, the app resets the color table when no adjustments are needed. This might be distracting or cause a black screen on some configurations.

Если эта функция включена, приложение сбрасывает таблицу цветов, когда корректировки не требуются. На некоторых конфигурациях это может отвлекать или вызывать черный экран.

trans-unit.id: Combine hardware brightness control (if available), software dimming and XDR/HDR upscaling into one unified brightness control.

trans-unit.source: Combined brightness - software dimming switchover point

trans-unit.source: Combined brightness is not required with default settings as the native XDR brightness scale covers the entire configurable scale. Use only if you want to finetune the dimming curve below the configured XDR brightness scale minimum

trans-unit.id: Configuration changes require reboot or activation.

trans-unit.source: Configure virtual screen/stream rotation - useful for portrait Sidecar or for displays that do not support changing orientation. With Sidecar you can decide whether the USB-C port (lightning connector) should face up or down.

trans-unit.source: Connects the virtual screen and starts full screen streaming from the virtual screen to the display. Also sets up the full screen stream to automatically start whenever the display is connected.

trans-unit.id: Create a virtual screen that matches to the aspect ratio of another display and associate the virtual screen with the display. Best for a scenario when the virtual screen should be streamed (e.g. portrait Sidecar) or mirrored to a display.
trans-unit.source: Create a virtual screen that matches to the aspect ratio of another display and associate the virtual screen with the display. Best for a scenario when the virtual screen should be streamed (e.g. portrait Sidecar) or mirrored to a display.

trans-unit.id: Define a custom app icon from Apple's SF Symbol icon library. You can download the SF Symbols app from [developer.apple.com/sf-symbols](https://developer.apple.com/sf-symbols) to find the right SF Symbol icon string (try: `face.smiling`).

trans-unit.id: Defines the diagonal size the system percieves the display. If used for mirroring/streaming, it might optionally be matched to the target screen. Safe to leave empty as default. With custom resolution list of varying aspect ratios the actual reported size may be different.
trans-unit.source: Defines the diagonal size the system percieves the display. If used for mirroring/streaming, it might optionally be matched to the target screen. Safe to leave empty as default. With custom resolution list of varying aspect ratios the actual reported size may be different.
trans-unit.target: Определяет размер диагонали, по которой система воспринимает дисплей. Если используется для зеркалирования/потоковой передачи, он может быть дополнительно сопоставлен с целевым экраном. По умолчанию можно оставить пустым. При использовании списка пользовательских разрешений с разным соотношением сторон фактический размер может отличаться.

trans-unit.id: Defines the lower bound of brightness control in nits. Use 0 to allow full continuous dimming to black.
trans-unit.source: Defines the lower bound of brightness control in nits. Use 0 to allow full continuous dimming to black.
trans-unit.target: Определяет нижнюю границу регулирования яркости в нитах. Используйте 0, чтобы обеспечить полную непрерывную регулировку яркости до черного цвета.

trans-unit.id: Defines the upper bound of brightness control in nits. Use 1000 for only allowing up to sustained full screen brightness.
trans-unit.source: Defines the upper bound of brightness control in nits. Use 1000 for only allowing up to sustained full screen brightness.

trans-unit.id: License management allows Pro features, purchasing, license activation and free trial. If you disable this, you can only use free features. License management requires communication with the payment and licensing provider Paddle ([paddle.com/privacy](https://paddle.com/privacy)).

trans-unit.id: The app will apply the loaded EDID when this display is connected. The operation causes the screen to flicker and switch modes if existing mode is not available with the updated EDID. If the new EDID has different id data (vendor, model, serial), the display will be redetected as a different one. Hold SHIFT on startup to enable safe mode and avoid auto-apply. Physically reconnect display to revert back to the original in case of serious trouble.

trans-unit.id: These three identifiers (serial number, vendor and model ID) serves as the basis for display identification in macOS. If any of these three identifiers are changed, the system will assign a new identity (UUID) to the virtual screen and treat it as newly connected display.
trans-unit.source: These three identifiers (serial number, vendor and model ID) serves as the basis for display identification in macOS. If any of these three identifiers are changed, the system will assign a new identity (UUID) to the virtual screen and treat it as newly connected display.

Если любой из этих трех идентификаторов будет изменен, система присвоит виртуальному экрану новый идентификатор (UUID) и будет рассматривать его как новый подключенный дисплей.

trans-unit.id: This allows advanced dimming, color adjustments and other features like software XDR/HDR upscaling. Note: color adjustments clip HDR content when in active use. If this option is disabled, the app will fall back to overlay based dimming control and uses Metal for software XDR/HDR upscaling.
trans-unit.source: This allows advanced dimming, color adjustments and other features like software XDR/HDR upscaling. Note: color adjustments clip HDR content when in active use. If this option is disabled, the app will fall back to overlay based dimming control and uses Metal for software XDR/HDR upscaling.
trans-unit.target: Это позволяет расширить возможности регулировки яркости, цвета и других функций, таких как программное масштабирование XDR/HDR. Примечание: при активном использовании регулировки цвета HDR-контент будет корректироваться. Если эта опция отключена, приложение вернется к управлению яркостью на основе оверлея и будет использовать Metal для программного XDR/HDR апскейлинга.

trans-unit.id: This configures how the data associated with the currently configured display is matched to a detected display during the configuration/detection process. Changing this setting might cause a display to be recognized as previously unconnected and disassociate existing saved display configuration data. System UUID match uses the MacOS default identification. When set to use basic identifiers, the app identifies the display by its vendor/model IDs and serial number. With extended it also uses product name, alphanumeric serial number, and production date. With location the app also considers hardware connectivity data.
trans-unit.source: This configures how the data associated with the currently configured display is matched to a detected display during the configuration/detection process. With extended it also uses product name, alphanumeric serial number, and production date. With location the app also considers hardware connectivity data.

trans-unit.id: When HDR upscaling is enabled while hardware brightness control is disabled, the app uses a continuous brightness scale between zero and the calibrated max upscale value. Due to this the neutral setting (100% brightness, when on-screen HDR content is unclipped) might not fall to an OSD chiclet boundary which makes it difficult to attain via the shortcut keys. To fix this an additional mid-chiclet step at 100% brightness is inserted.
trans-unit.source: When HDR upscaling is enabled while hardware brightness control is disabled, the app uses a continuous brightness scale between zero and the calibrated max upscale value. Due to this the neutral setting (100% brightness, when on-screen HDR content is unclipped) might not fall to an OSD chiclet boundary which makes it difficult to attain via the shortcut keys. To fix this an additional mid-chiclet step at 100% brightness is inserted.
trans-unit.target: При включении HDR-апскейлинга и отключении аппаратного управления яркостью приложение использует непрерывную шкалу яркости от нуля до откалиброванного максимального значения апскейлинга. Из-за этого нейтральная настройка (100 % яркости, когда экранное HDR-содержимое не зажато) может не попадать на границу экранного чиклета, что затрудняет ее достижение с помощью быстрых клавиш. Для устранения этой проблемы вводится дополнительный шаг в середине чиклета при яркости 100 %.

trans-unit.source: With this option selected, the app will leave native brightness keys under macOS control if only Apple displays are connected with no additional software brightness control features enabled. Однако в этом случае различные настройки (например, "Сделать тонкую шкалу по умолчанию" или управление "Всеми подходящими экранами" одновременно), изменяющие поведение клавиш яркости по умолчанию, не будут применяться.
